Package org.anchoranalysis.image.object

Class ObjectsWithBoundingBox

Object
ObjectsWithBoundingBox
public class ObjectsWithBoundingBox
extends Object
One or more objects with the a bounding-box that contains them all fully
Author:
Owen Feehan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ObjectsWithBoundingBox​(ObjectCollection objects)
    Creates for a collection of objects, minimally fitting a bounding-box around all objects
    ObjectsWithBoundingBox​(ObjectMask object)
    Creates for a single object, using its current bounding-box.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ObjectsWithBoundingBox addObjectsNoBoundingBoxChange​(ObjectCollection objectsToAdd)
    Adds objects without changing the bounding-box
    BoundingBox boundingBox()
    A bounding-box that must contain all objects in the collection
    ObjectMask get​(int index)
    Gets a particular object
    ObjectsWithBoundingBox mapBoundingBoxToBigger​(BoundingBox boundingBoxToAssign)
    Maps the containing bounding-box to a larger one (that must contain the existing box)
    ObjectsWithBoundingBox mapObjectsToUseEntireImage​(Dimensions dimensions)
    Maps the containing-box to the entire image-dimensions, and changes each object-mask to belong to the entiore dimensions
    ObjectCollection objects()
    The objects in the collection.
    int size()
    The number of objects

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectsWithBoundingBox

      public ObjectsWithBoundingBox​(ObjectMask object)
      Creates for a single object, using its current bounding-box.
      Parameters:
      object - the object

    • ObjectsWithBoundingBox

      public ObjectsWithBoundingBox​(ObjectCollection objects) throws OperationFailedException
      Creates for a collection of objects, minimally fitting a bounding-box around all objects
      Parameters:
      objects - objects
      Throws:
      OperationFailedException - if the object-collection is empty

  • Method Details

    • mapBoundingBoxToBigger

      public ObjectsWithBoundingBox mapBoundingBoxToBigger​(BoundingBox boundingBoxToAssign) throws OperationFailedException
      Maps the containing bounding-box to a larger one (that must contain the existing box)
      Parameters:
      boundingBoxToAssign - the new bounding-box to assign
      Returns:
      newly-created with the same object-container but a different bounding-box
      Throws:
      OperationFailedException - if the new bounding-box does not contain the existing one

    • mapObjectsToUseEntireImage

      public ObjectsWithBoundingBox mapObjectsToUseEntireImage​(Dimensions dimensions) throws OperationFailedException
      Maps the containing-box to the entire image-dimensions, and changes each object-mask to belong to the entiore dimensions
      Parameters:
      dimensions - the scene dimensions
      Returns:
      newly-created with new objects and a new bounding-box
      Throws:
      OperationFailedException - if the image-dimensions don't contain the existing bounding-boc

    • addObjectsNoBoundingBoxChange

      public ObjectsWithBoundingBox addObjectsNoBoundingBoxChange​(ObjectCollection objectsToAdd)
      Adds objects without changing the bounding-box

      The operation is immutable.

      Parameters:
      objectsToAdd - objects to add (unchanged)
      Returns:
      a newly created ObjectsWithBoundingBox with the combined objects and the same bounding-box

    • size

      public int size()
      The number of objects

    • get

      public ObjectMask get​(int index)
      Gets a particular object

    • objects

      public ObjectCollection objects()
      The objects in the collection. This collection should not be altered after the constructor (treated immutably).

    • boundingBox

      public BoundingBox boundingBox()
      A bounding-box that must contain all objects in the collection
